description: CG-01 is a reserved registration code specifically allocated for vehicles belonging to the Governor of Chhattisgarh. Unlike standard RTO codes used by the general public, this series is dedicated to the official transport requirements of the Raj Bhavan and is managed through the State Transport Headquarters.
address: Raj Bhavan, Civil Lines, Raipur, Chhattisgarh

description: CG-02 is a specialized RTO code reserved exclusively for vehicles owned by the Government of Chhattisgarh. Unlike district-specific codes, this registration series is used for the state's official departmental fleet and is managed from the state capital.
address: Transport Commissioner Office, Block-4, 3rd Floor, Indrawati Bhawan, Nava Raipur Atal Nagar, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-03 code is a special registration series reserved exclusively for vehicles owned and operated by the Chhattisgarh Police Department. It has statewide jurisdiction and is managed by the State Transport Authority rather than a specific regional office for civilian use.
address: State Transport Authority, Indravati Bhawan, Naya Raipur, Chhattisgarh

description: The Raipur RTO (CG-04) serves as the primary regional transport authority for the state capital of Chhattisgarh. It manages a wide range of services including vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and tax collection for the Raipur district, which is the state's most significant administrative and commercial center.
address: Regional Transport Office, Rawabhata, Near Maa Banjari Mandir, Bhanpuri, Raipur, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-05 RTO serves the Dhamtari district in Chhattisgarh, providing essential services such as vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and road tax collection. It is a critical transport office within the Raipur administrative division and ensures traffic safety and legal compliance across the district.
address: Village Bhoyna, Nagri Road, Dhamtari, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-06 RTO is the designated transport authority for the Mahasamund district in Chhattisgarh. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and ensuring compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act across its jurisdiction.
address: District Collectorate Office Premises, Mahasamund, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-07 RTO serves the Durg district, which includes the significant industrial city of Bhilai. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport safety compliance for one of Chhattisgarh's most populous regions.
address: Regional Transport Office, Opposite 5 Building, Jail Road, Durg, Chhattisgarh

description: CG-08 is the Assistant Regional Transport Office (ARTO) serving the Rajnandgaon district in Chhattisgarh. It is a key administrative hub for vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement in this significant industrial and agricultural region.
address: ARTO Office, Pendri, Near Medical College, Rajnandgaon, Chhattisgarh

description: CG-09 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Kabirdham district, headquartered in Kawardha. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of motor vehicle laws within the district. This RTO is a key administrative hub for the region, which is famous for the historical Bhoramdeo Temple.
address: District Transport Office, Chhirpani Colony, Kabirdham, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-10 Regional Transport Office serves the Bilaspur district, which is the second largest city and a significant judicial hub in Chhattisgarh. This office handles all aspects of vehicle registration, licensing, and road tax collection for the region, having replaced the old MP-26 code after the state's formation.
address: Regional Transport Office, Bus Stand Parisar, Bilaspur, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-11 RTO serves the Janjgir-Champa district in Chhattisgarh, acting as the primary office for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permit issuance. Located in the Bilaspur division, it is a significant administrative center for the district's road transport and regulatory activities.
address: Janjgir Road, Hasdeo Vihar Colony, Jarve(B), Janjgir-Champa, Chhattisgarh

description: CG-12 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Korba district in Chhattisgarh, widely recognized as the power hub of India due to its vast coal reserves and thermal power plants. The office facilitates motor vehicle registrations, driving license issuances, and enforcement of transport safety norms throughout the Korba industrial and residential sectors.
address: District Transport Office, Old Collectorate Office, Korba, Chhattisgarh

description: CG-13 is the designated Regional Transport Office for the Raigarh district in Chhattisgarh. This office is responsible for vehicle registrations, issuing driving licenses, and enforcing transport regulations in this key industrial and coal-mining region.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Premises, Raigarh, Chhattisgarh

description: CG-14 is the District Transport Office serving the Jashpur district in Chhattisgarh. It is responsible for vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and regulatory oversight for the northern border region of the state.
address: District Transport Office, Tehsil Parisar, Jashpur, Chhattisgarh

description: CG-15 is the Regional Transport Office serving Ambikapur in the Surguja district of Chhattisgarh. It handles registration of motor vehicles, issuance of driving licenses, and collection of road taxes for the northern region of the state. The office is a vital hub for transportation services in one of Chhattisgarh's major administrative divisions.
address: Pratappur Road, Sarganva, Ambikapur, Chhattisgarh - 497001

description: The CG-16 RTO office is located in Baikunthpur and serves as the primary transport authority for the Koriya district in northern Chhattisgarh. It manages vehicle registrations, driving license issuances, and transport permit services for the region.
address: Regional Transport Office, Collectorate Road, Chindand, Baikunthpur, Koriya, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-17 RTO is located in Jagdalpur and serves as the primary regional transport office for the Bastar district. It handles all transport-related activities including vehicle registration, driving licenses, and permit issuance for the southern Bastar region, which transitioned from the MP-25 code following the state's creation in 2000.
address: Regional Transport Office, Adawal, Kurandi Road, Jagdalpur, Chhattisgarh

description: CG-18 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Dantewada, also known as South Bastar, in Chhattisgarh. The office is responsible for vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and collection of road taxes for the southern tribal region of the state.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Office Campus, Dantewada, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-19 RTO serves the Kanker district (North Bastar Kanker) in Chhattisgarh, facilitating vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permits. It is an essential administrative hub for the transport infrastructure within the tribal-dominated Bastar region.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Compound, Near Maa Shitla Mandir, Bardebhata, Kanker, Chhattisgarh

description: The CG-20 RTO serves the Bijapur district in the Bastar division of Chhattisgarh. It is responsible for vehicle registrations, issuing driving licenses, and enforcing transport regulations within the district, which was established as a separate administrative unit in 2007.
address: District Transport Office, Bijapur, Chhattisgarh
